data.name: ReadLegalActionCsePersonCsePersonLegalActionDetail
data.value: select distinct T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID, T1.CLASSIFICATION, T1.ACTION_TAKEN, T1.STANDARD_NO, T1.CREATED_TSTAMP, T1.ESTABLISHMENT_CD, T1.FILED_DT_ENTRED_ON, T6.CSP_NUMBER, T8.CSP_NUMBER, T4.LA_DETAIL_NO, T4.CREATED_TSTAMP, T4.CURRENT_AMOUNT, T4.DETAIL_TYPE, T4.FRQ_PRD_CD, T4.OTY_ID from CKT_CASE_ROLE T8 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T6 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEG_ACT_CAS_RL T5 with(readuncommitted) on (T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T5.LGA_ID) and (T1.CLASSIFICATION = 'J') and (T1.ESTABLISHMENT_CD in ('CS', 'CT')) and (T1.FILED_DT_ENTRED_ON > @filedDtEntredOn) on (T6.CASE_ROLE_ID = T5.CRO_IDENTIFIER) and (T6.TYPE = T5.CRO_TYPE) and (T6.CSP_NUMBER = T5.CSP_NUMBER) and (T6.CAS_NUMBER = T5.CAS_NUMBER) and (@casNumber = T6.CAS_NUMBER) and (T6.TYPE = 'AP') join CKT_LEG_ACT_CAS_RL T7 with(readuncommitted) on T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T7.LGA_ID on (T8.CASE_ROLE_ID = T7.CRO_IDENTIFIER) and (T8.TYPE = T7.CRO_TYPE) and (T8.CSP_NUMBER = T7.CSP_NUMBER) and (T8.CAS_NUMBER = T7.CAS_NUMBER) and (@casNumber = T8.CAS_NUMBER) and (T8.TYPE = 'CH') and (T8.END_DATE >= T6.START_DATE) and (T8.START_DATE <= T6.END_DATE) join CKT_LEGAL_ACT_DTL T4 with(readuncommitted) on ( (T1.FILED_DT_ENTRED_ON between cast(@date1 as date) and cast(@date2 as date)) or ( (T1.FILED_DT_ENTRED_ON > @filedDtEntredOn) and (T4.CREATED_TSTAMP > @createdTstamp1) and (T4.CREATED_TSTAMP < @createdTstamp2) ) ) and (T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T4.LGA_IDENTIFIER) and (T4.OTY_ID = 1) order by T1.STANDARD_NO
